attributes.action: Justice For Neil A Scott £50,900 Burglar wrongly convicted
attributes.additional_details: After harassment By Police in Middlesbrough and  23 False arrests,All Won At courts,Which Left Only One Conviction To Clear My Name ion 46 years,they REFUSED My Appeal to do this,thee Chief of the Police force,the detectives of that Police Force,the CPS under the same Authority,the MP of the Same Authority,the 6 judges involved in this conspiracy to defruad,Knew I was Not Guilty of this Offence,My Wrongfull conviction is known throughout,it was highly Publicised,the say I the Accused  committed 3 Burglaries at the Same address,Arrested Twice for it,with only one Conviction for it,No Motive for it,No stolen items,No fingerprints were found,No DNA was found,No Hair Follicles were found,No Blood was found at the THREE  Burglaries,My Blood Was taken at a Police station 4 Miles Away from the Three  Burglaries.Too Many inconsistencies in this case.   http://Wp.me/p2euOV-4.
